title: Image 2 image with Diffusers?
body: Is there a way to use Kolors diffusers code for img2img?  ie use a source image and change it with a text prompt?
author: SoftologyPro
satisfaction_conditions: Confirmation that the Kolors library supports image-to-image transformations with text prompts
Identification of the specific component/module designed for img2img functionality

title: Please Add More Training Details in the Paper
body:
At page 5 Figure 2: Qualitative comparison between (a) Kolors with CLIP and (b) Kolors with GLM

It demonstrates Kolors could use clip or GLM as text encoder.
Does it mean Kolors could switch Clip and GLM on the fly?
Or it was two seperate model weights which seperately trained with clip and glm?

How does kolors trained in detail?

Please explain more, thank you.
author: lrzjason

comments.body: Two seperate model weights which seperately trained with clip and glm, we only release the glm one

satisfaction_conditions: Clarify whether CLIP and GLM implementations are interchangeable components or separate trained models
Explain the training methodology for different text encoder configurations
Specify availability status of different model versions
